law.history: Repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 508, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 28, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 46, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(1). -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 50. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 68, Art. V, secs. 1 and 2.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Functions of state local debt officer exercised by Office of the Controller.
